title: PMT HANDYMAN (CARPENTER)
description:
TRANSFORM YOUR CAREER WITH TREE TOP HOSPITAL

Tree Top Hospital is a world class tertiary Hospital aimed to transform the healthcare landscape of Maldives. 

Position Available: PMT HANDYMAN (CARPENTER) 

General Requirements
•	Basic education
•	Minimum 1-3 years of experience in relevant field
•	Ability to communication in English
•	Physically fit to endure long working hours

Duties and Responsibilities
•	Install, maintain, and repair a variety of products, ranging from cabinets to insulation to tile to drywall
•	Installs locks, knobs, hinges, closures, and other fixtures to structures
•	Perform work in accordance with safety best practices
•	Maintain tools and equipment in safe operating condition
•	Conduct building inspections and identify needed repairs
•	Document repairs and maintain thorough records
•	Cut, shape, and alter materials as needed
•	Build doors, cabinets, and windows
•	Measure and mark materials for alterations

Salary & Benefits
•	Attractive Salary
•	30 Days Paid Annual Leave
•	Medical Insurance
•	Meal while on duty

How to Apply - If you are interested in this job, please E-mail your updated CV along with the following mandatory documents to careers@treetophospital.com on or before 5pm of 18th June 2020.

1.	National Identity Card or Passport.
2.	Recent Passport Size Photograph.
3.	Updated CV.
4. Relevant Educational Certificates (Attested from law firm’s/government offices).
5. Reference Letter / Experience Letter (from current and previous employer).
  6. Recent Police Report

title: HVAC TECHNICIAN
description:
TRANSFORM YOUR CAREER WITH TREE TOP HOSPITAL

Tree Top Hospital is a world class tertiary Hospital aimed to transform the healthcare landscape of Maldives. 

Position Available: HVAC TECHNICIAN 
			   
General Requirements
•	Must have at least Grade 10 or Grade 8 with Certificate Level 3 in Air Conditioning & Refrigeration and cooling systems, or basic electronic technology or basic house wiring, or engine repair and maintenance or welding and sheet metal fabrication or any other relevant areas, and 2 years’ experience; or
	O’ Level with at least 1-year experience of General Preventative Maintenance program
•	Good English communication skills.
•	Maldivians preferred
Duties & Responsibilities
•	Responsible for the work of the Air Condition & Refrigeration Section and to ensure completion of all works given to them by engineering management in a correct and satisfactory manner in compliance with management instructions, and ensuring that works are completed to times set, with correct materials in a proper professional manner.
•	Responsible for handing over to any incoming shift operative in the section any unfinished repairs that due to lack of time have not been completed and follow up of outstanding repairs and ensure a good standard of work.
•	In the event of repair/s being beyond the expertise of the technician/Supervisor, the fault should immediately be reported to engineering management after first ensuring that any un-repaired fault likely to cause an accident or health hazard is isolated and that such equipment is left in a completely safe condition with any appropriate warning notices attached.
•	Responsible for the operation and maintenance of all TTH plant and equipment for which they are given charge of, including compliance with all maintenance scheduling set or approved by engineering management and reporting any other faults via the CMMS.   
•	Responsible that they answer all work orders and radio calls promptly with minimum delay 
•	Ensuring that all work orders issued to them are completed correctly and the CMMS updated on a timely manner to ensure proper record keeping.
•	Responsible for keeping clean and tidy all areas they have worked in during their shift hours.
•	Responsible for noting any and all items used by themselves during their working hours and recording these items and accounting for them via the established systems.
•	Responsible for reporting all potential hazards while on duty to senior management.
•	To co-operate with and assist TTH management as and when required.
•	Responsible for maintaining a brief accurate record of the day’s activities via the established systems.
•	To assist in the training of other staff members as may be required
•	To ensure that any supplied uniform is clean and in good repair especially before entering any guest areas 

•	To comply with all Health and Safety Precautions whilst at work with particular regard to the current use of equipment and materials.
•	To undergo any training deemed necessary by the Facilities Manager.
•	Assist other maintenance personnel as may be required and for carrying out any other engineering duties as may be required by the TTH engineering management and according to the needs of the department
•	To follow all fire and evacuation and other emergency procedures.
•	Reference to abide with the Company’s Code of Conduct
•	To undertake any new installation works as may be directed by Engineering.

 Salary & Benefits
•	Attractive Salary
•	30 Days Paid Annual Leave
•	Medical Insurance
•	Meal while on duty

How to Apply - If you are interested in this job, please E-mail your updated CV along with the following mandatory documents to careers@treetophospital.com on or before 5pm of 18th June 2020.

1.	National Identity Card or Passport.
2.	Recent Passport Size Photograph.
3.	Updated CV.
4. Relevant Educational Certificates (Attested from law firm’s/government offices).
5. Reference Letter / Experience Letter (from current and previous employer).
  6. Recent Police Report 

 To process the application, we require you to submit all of the documents above.

We thank all participants for their interest, however, only those selected for further consideration will be contacted. For more information, please call +960 3351610.

title: CASHIER
description:
CASHIER

General Requirement:
We are looking for highly motivated and self-disciplined candidates to join our team!

•	Excellent communication & sales skills

•	Female Preferred

company.name: Rainbow Enterprises Pvt Ltd
company.introduction:
Rainbow Enterprises Pvt Ltd (Rainbow) registered in Republic of Maldives in 1990 had its origin in the
building industry. The founding shareholders of Rainbow were the group who started the first
registered architectural and engineering firm (Tekton Design Associates Pvt Ltd) in the Maldives.
The main objective of Rainbow was to enter various businesses related to building industry and
therefore initially started trading in building materials and furniture. The company�s focus is to source
quality products and supply to the market at an affordable price. Rainbow owns various outlets in
Male� for selling its range of products and has a distribution network for selling to the outer islands of
the country.Over the years Rainbow diversified into related specialized areas through associated and
subsidiary companies. Therefore our goal is to become a market leader in delivering a wide range of
quality building products including those related to living solution to all the segments of the market.Rainbow Enterprises in partnership with its associated companies (Rainbow Group) will work as a
unified team to give a high quality service to the customers to achieve the group�s goal as a One Stop
Building Solution provider to the Maldives market.
